title: Hour 2: Best QB in CFB
description:
Ryan Clark, Chris Russo, and David Pollack debate who the best QB in college football is. The guys discuss if Will Anderson is a threat to win the Heisman. Stick around to hear Chris give his list of the most storied college football programs, The crew debates who the biggest threat to the Bills in the AFC East is and whether Derrick Henry is the best RB in the NFL.
